resources: CoWApp //Main LOG Settings Info Test Report Infection Suspicion? View to show the current risk status via traffic light status. //Main risk status current risk Low Risk Moderate Risk High Risk Risk Level: %1$d of 100 Current Infection //Date and days since use Since %1$s you are helping for %2$d days to fight the coronavirus. //Data Protection Accept Decline Terms of Use You agree that CoWApp is allowed to activate the Bluetooth of your device and send or receive data via it (generated keys with time stamp and location as well as information about your current infection status). Furthermore you agree that the app may run as a background process on your mobile device at any time and is allowed to send your generated and collected anonymous keys to the server if there is an existing infection and you push notifications, too. This is the only way the correct function of the Corona-Warn-App is given. //Info Menu and pages Further Information General Information The CoWApp (Corona Warning App) is an application that anyone can use to further contain the spread of the coronavirus. With it potential contact with corona-infected people can be determined in everyday life and an infection risk can be calculated. It is and displayed by the traffic light principle and a risk value of 1 to 100. You will also receive a push notification when a potential health risk has been identified so you know how to act correctly to protect yourself and those around you. Under Suspicion? you can receive information on what to do if you suspect an infection. Risk Level Calculation Ticket 96 Current Infection - How to act? In the event of an acute infection, you are obliged to go into quarantine immediately and remain in quarantine for 14 days or until you receive a negative PCR test result. You are also obliged to notify your local health department. Any roommates should also be tested immediately and you are encouraged to distance yourself from them. Further information at the page of the federal government or the WHO: https://www.bundesregierung.de/breg-de/themen/coronavirus/coronavirus-wissen for German speaking people or https://www.who.int/health-topics/coronavirus#tab=tab_1 for general information. //LOG Notification Log This is a notification //Push Notification NotificationChannel This channel is for push notifications to inform about possible health risk Okay Possible health risk A person with whom you were in direct or indirect contact has been infected with the corona virus. Please let yourself be tested and go into quarantine until you receive a negative test result. //Report Infection No Yes Do you really want to report yourself infected? (Only with positive PCR test result.) //Settings Setting 1 Setting 2 //Suspicion Suspicion? - What to do? In case of suspicion, please go into quarantine immediately and let yourself be tested. If the test result is positive, please inform the health department for your region and stay in quarantine for 14 days. If the test result is negative, you can end the quarantine. Thank you for your help to dam the further spread of the corona virus. //Test Menu Test menu push notification test key generation test risk level test check infection status test log own keys test delete own keys test reset risk level Transmitting on/off Scanning on/off //Thank You Screen Thank you for the report! The app warns your surroundings. Please inform your local health department and immediately go into 14-day quarantine. //BeaconBackgroundService (foreground) Notification Protection active Test-Actions Debug-Log-Settings Debug-Log What do you want to log?
